'''David Collings''' ([[4 June]] [[1940]] - [[23 March]] [[2020]]) was a British actor. He voiced the part of [[Legolas]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' 1981 radio series]] broadcast on the BBC 4.
